Word_Entry.notes: She makes delicious adobo. Very tasty!
Word_Entry.hint: Nanay - Pepay's Mother. She's the one that cooks for the family

Word_Entry.notes: He was the one that made our treehouse in the backyard.
Word_Entry.hint: This is my father. He is the one that works for the family

Word_Entry.notes: He also teases me a lot.
Word_Entry.hint: My older brother. He likes to play basketball and all different kinds of sports.

Word_Entry.notes: She told me she really likes this boy once. i forgot his name.
Word_Entry.hint: She is my older sister. She likes to spend her time with her phone.

Word_Entry.notes: We play board games a lot
Word_Entry.hint: My father's father. He uses glasses to read the newspaper

Word_Entry.notes: She also likes to tell us stories from her time.
Word_Entry.hint: My father's mother. She walks around with a cane

Word_Entry.notes: He is also very cute.
Word_Entry.hint: My younger sibling. He likes to play toys

Word_Entry.notes: He tells horrible jokes.
Word_Entry.hint: He is my parent's brother. I don't know which one though

Word_Entry.notes: She likes to hang out with my mother.
Word_Entry.hint: My mother's sister. She is a great cook too

Word_Entry.notes: It also protects us from rain
Word_Entry.hint: Bubong - It covers the top part of the house

Word_Entry.notes: Tita hangs picture frames around here
Word_Entry.hint: Dingding - Covers the front, side and back parts of the house

Word_Entry.notes: We use this to get to different parts of the house too
Word_Entry.hint: Pinto - We open this one to get inside the house

Word_Entry.notes: Sometimes you see birds just outside here
Word_Entry.hint: Bintana - They are made of glass so that you can look from the inside

Word_Entry.notes: Tito keeps his tools here as well
Word_Entry.hint: Garahe - This is where tito parks his car.

Word_Entry.notes: It looks like arrows pointing up
Word_Entry.hint: Bakuran - This protects our house from strangers

Word_Entry.notes: It's also the color of the sea
Word_Entry.hint: Asul - This is BLUE. It is the color of the sky

Word_Entry.notes: It's also the color of crocodiles and alligators
Word_Entry.hint: Berde - This is GREEN. It is the color of the grass and leaves

Word_Entry.notes: It is also the color of a firetruck
Word_Entry.hint: Pula - This is RED. It is the color of an apple

Word_Entry.notes: It is also the color of a rubber ducky
Word_Entry.hint: Dilaw - This is YELLOW. It is the color of the sun.

Word_Entry.notes: It is also the color of the skin
Word_Entry.hint: Kayumanggi - This is BROWN. It is the color of a trunk of a tree

Word_Entry.notes: It is also the color of grapes
Word_Entry.hint: Lila - This is VIOLET. It is also the color of eggplants

Word_Entry.notes: It is also the color of car tires
Word_Entry.hint: Itim - This is BLACK. it is also the color fot he night sky

Word_Entry.notes: It is also the color of doves
Word_Entry.hint: Puti - This is WHITE. It is also the color of clouds

Word_Entry.notes: It looks like the shape of a ball right?
Word_Entry.hint: Bilog - Circle. It is round and has no edges. It also puts a shield around us. Cool!

Word_Entry.notes: It looks like a door too.
Word_Entry.hint: Parsukat - A rectangle! It looks like a long box. It releases a sword. Why does this ship have a sword?

Word_Entry.notes: I wonder if a star really looks like this.
Word_Entry.hint: Bituin - A star shape! Teachers gives us these when we do well. It fires fire. Hahaha!

Word_Entry.notes: MMM I'd like a slice of pizza right about now.
Word_Entry.hint: Tatsulok - A triangle. It has 3 sides. Oh and it shoots lasers/
